attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that due to changes in the law we should be able to gamble whilst in the free house. it has been mentioned before and i think this could take off. i would like to be the first person to open a gambling pub

rejection.details: Please replace the main sentence with a clear action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
